text: Simo Laaksonen (born 10 September 1998) is a Finnish racing driver, who competes for MP Motorsport in the FIA Formula 3 Championship. ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" !
